full_summary:
======================================================

[Ontario Government Tender Announcement]
---------------------------------------

### Tender Details

| Reference No. | W4948-23SE31 |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation No. | WS3486402507 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 13, 2022, 2:00 pm EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | October 18, 2022 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2025 |

### Notice-Type

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Competitive Bidding

### Product Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires the supply and delivery of Benchmade training daggers and dagger combos to add to their existing inventory. All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.

### Contracting Entity Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* Nametag: Kathleen Nimuan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
* Address: None

### Technical Information

* UNSPSC Code: 46101902 (Military Knife or Dagger)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Notes

* This tender has expired.
* Amendments are allowed.
* Bidders are required to submit their proposals by the stipulated closing date and time.
* Proposals received after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

### Tender Description

This tender is for the supply and delivery of Benchmade training daggers and dagger combos. Proposals must include all required supporting documentation, and must be submitted on or before the closing date and time. The Contracting Entity will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price. All the deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.

### Attachment

None.

### Notice URL

* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14179964](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14179964)
* English
* French
